Uses of Package
com.octo.captcha.image.gimpy.wordtoimage

Packages that use com.octo.captcha.image.gimpy.wordtoimage
com.octo.captcha.image.gimpy.wordtoimage this package provides implementations of the WordToImage interface. 
com.octo.captcha.image.gimpy.wordtoimage.backgroundgenerator Implementations of AbstractBackgroundGenerator. 
com.octo.captcha.image.gimpy.wordtoimage.fontgenerator Implementations of AbstractFontGenerator. 
com.octo.captcha.image.gimpy.wordtoimage.textpaster implementations of AbstractTextPaster 
 

Classes in com.octo.captcha.image.gimpy.wordtoimage used by com.octo.captcha.image.gimpy.wordtoimage
AbstractWordToImage
          Implementation skeletton for the WordToImage interface Basically this class implements the imageFromWord method proceding as folow : Checks the word lenght Creates an java.text.AttributedString from the word Apply font to the AttributedString using the abstract method getFont Create an image for the background using the abstact method getBackround Put the text on the backround using the abstact method pasteText Return the newly created image This class implements the Template method pattern from the GOF design patterns.
BackgroundGenerator
          Used by ComposedWordToImage to build a background image
ComposedWordToImage
          Base class for composed WordToImage It extends the AbstractWord to image and uses three abstract subclasses : a AbstractFontGenerator to implement the getFont() method a AbstractBackgroundGenerator to implement the getBackround() method a AbstractTextParser to implement the pasteText() method By this design people can implement separatly different parts of the algorithm.
FontGenerator
          Used by ComposedWordToImage to retrieve a Font to apply to the word that will be distorded
TextPaster
          Used by ComposedWordToImage to paste the word to be distorded on the image background
 

Classes in com.octo.captcha.image.gimpy.wordtoimage used by com.octo.captcha.image.gimpy.wordtoimage.backgroundgenerator
BackgroundGenerator
          Used by ComposedWordToImage to build a background image
 

Classes in com.octo.captcha.image.gimpy.wordtoimage used by com.octo.captcha.image.gimpy.wordtoimage.fontgenerator
FontGenerator
          Used by ComposedWordToImage to retrieve a Font to apply to the word that will be distorded
 

Classes in com.octo.captcha.image.gimpy.wordtoimage used by com.octo.captcha.image.gimpy.wordtoimage.textpaster
TextPaster
          Used by ComposedWordToImage to paste the word to be distorded on the image background
